A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's not a good movie unfortunately. I don't think it's a one star movie as far as movies go but I'm giving it one star because it killed the new trilogy. It's incredibly long\, unimaginative and soulless. They followed the same cookie cutter approach that TFA did but somehow made it even worse. There was no character development or surprising twists. I could have wrote a better overall plot than they did. It lacks imagination at best and was really cheesy at worst.
